name: DCS Warthog Device
description:
This app can control DCS : A-10C Warthog MFCD (Left / Right) and UFC and also CDU using your iphone or iPAD

You need server program for this app.
https://cduapp.tistory.com/36

Feature

- Just few click for your MFCD export. (All in GUI, no need type anything)
- You can setup to use partial of your extra monitor for MFCD export.
- Exit server program will rollback everything exactly as you used before.
- Day / Night support
- Short / Long press support for each button

Visit https://cduapp.tistory.com for more information and if you need help, contact me via ihopi73@gmail.com.
